--------------------
Text: Cyclone (Revere Beach):  In addition to being the tallest roller coaster of its day, some also claim that it was the largest and fastest roller coaster in the world, with a length of 3600 ft and top speeds between 45 and 50 mph (some dispute the speed record claim and instead award that honor to the Giant Dipper).
Triplets:<Cyclone
3:
--------------------
Text: Cyclone (Revere Beach):  Cyclone held the title of world's tallest roller coaster until 1964 when it was surpassed by Montaña Rusa at La Feria Chapultepec Mágico in Mexico City, Mexico.
Triplets:<Cyclone
